column2: "The native creatures on Naberius haven't always been this violent. You used to be able to walk up and pet them."
"I suppose it's only been recently that they've started attacking us."
"Exactly what triggered this change, I still have no idea."
"I've thought about investigating, but that seemed to tiresome. So it remains a mystery."
"But there seems to be a research student who has been looking into it."
